channel.title: Comments on: A Seven Alt Army

item.title: By: Rsstinks
item.dc:creator: Rsstinks
item.description: HEHE. this was an awesome story. Hey i got a question for any one. is there any way to dodge freakin parental controls? im freakin 13 i should be able to choose when i can play!! and if u feel like it, add me to your friends list on WoW. its almost full though. :P
item.content:encoded: HEHE. this was an awesome story. Hey i got a question for any one. is there any way to dodge freakin parental controls? im freakin 13 i should be able to choose when i can play!! and if u feel like it, add me to your friends list on WoW. its almost full though. ðŸ˜›

item.title: By: Troy Goodfellow
item.dc:creator: Troy Goodfellow
item.description: Wow. Great story. It's stuff like this that makes me want to get into the whole MMO thing.
item.content:encoded: Wow. Great story. It’s stuff like this that makes me want to get into the whole MMO thing.

item.description: [...] zled war veteran and shocking storyteller, AFK Gamer, recounts his days in A Seven Alt Army. Next up, we find… well, look who we have here! It’s the [...]

item.title: By: Aufero
item.dc:creator: Aufero
item.content:encoded:
also of note is that blizzard thought it would be hilarious to slap a lvl 35 tag on him when he’s actualy a 50 to 55 (spawns within that range).

Either he isn’t 50, or my Paladin is godlike – I beat him several times as a Paladin while I was in the 42-46 level range. (with, naturally, 5 or 10 level 25’s beating on him from behind.) He’s tough for 35, but not *that* tough.

Funny story, though. ðŸ™‚

item.title: By: Anon
item.dc:creator: Anon
item.description:
/applaud - Well spun tale Foton. :)
When will noobs learn? The Chinese Death Wave approach just doesn't work in this game.
item.content:encoded:
/applaud – Well spun tale Foton. ðŸ™‚

item.title: By: Troggdor
item.dc:creator: Troggdor
item.description: He's an abomination not an ogre, also of note is that blizzard thought it would be hilarious to slap a lvl 35 tag on him when he's actualy a 50 to 55 (spawns within that range). I kill him every chance i get in thanks for killing me like 10 times while i was in duskwood back in the 20s.
item.content:encoded: He’s an abomination not an ogre, also of note is that blizzard thought it would be hilarious to slap a lvl 35 tag on him when he’s actualy a 50 to 55 (spawns within that range). I kill him every chance i get in thanks for killing me like 10 times while i was in duskwood back in the 20s.
